page.title: 10Leisure and Recreation
page.content: We asked a cross section of villagers to complete a questionnaire about how they spend their leisure time. Most popular group was the church group and mothers and toddlers group. Some groups were not used by villagers but were popular with outsiders. Hartington walks were popular, favourites being the Pilsbury, Manifold and Beresford Dale walks. Television was a favourite with many, Dynasty and gardening programmes topping the poll. Gardening itself was not a favourite hobby. Everyone agreed that more leisure time would be a good idea.
